scheme_name: Vocational Education and Training Loan Scheme
description: Provides financial assistance to the youth of the target group to enhance their skills and employability.
benefits: Need-based finance to meet up to 90% of expenses (ceilings apply)
Up to Rs. 4,00,000/- for courses of duration up to 2 years
Interest rate of 4% per annum (3.5% for women)
Repayment period of up to 7 years
eligibility: Must be from the target group of NSKFDC

Must have secured admission in a course run or supported by a Ministry, Department, or Organization of the Government or a company, society, or organization supported by the National Skill Development Corporation or State Skill Missions/State Skill Corporations
Course duration should be a minimum of 6 months and up to 2 years
Minimum age of 18 years on completion of the course
Upper age limit of up to 50 years
